description: Discover the best hotels in Mallorca, Spain. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Dreamy Mallorca Seaside Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
hotels.description: Tucked into 80,000 squared metres of sun-soaked Mediterranean beauty, this family-friendly oasis feels more like a sanctuary than a hotel. Just a short stroll or shuttle ride from some of the island's best beaches, it's a place where you can unwind in peace or dive into fun. Seven tennis courts, heated pools and world-class spa facilities create an irresistible playground for making memories. Every meal here is something to look forward to. From hearty Mallorcan dishes that taste like tradition to fresh, creative Mediterranean plates, the food is full of personality and passion. Grab a wood-fired pizza by the pool, sip something cold as the sun goes down or linger over dinner at Llevant restaurant. Days blur into nights of pure enchantment. Whether it's kids splashing around under pirate ships or parents sneaking off to the spa, there's something for everyone. Blaudiland kids’ club keeps little adventurers spellbound, while grown-ups can dip into archery, table tennis or just a good book by the pool. From dawn till dusk, it’s the kind of place that makes ordinary days feel extraordinary.

hotels.title: Mallorca Seaside Island Luxury with Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Since the 1950s, Hospes Maricel & Spa has been at the forefront of luxury hotels on Mallorca, overlooking the sapphire seas of the Mediterranean. Spend balmy Spanish days lounging by the infinity pool with a cocktail in hand, or let the sounds of waves crashing lull you into a meditative state at Bodyna Spa, where massages take place with soothing ocean views. At Maricel Restaurant, exquisite dishes made from fresh local seafood and seasonal produce will delight your tastebuds.

hotels.title: Sky-High Mallorca Clifftop Retreat with Three Bars, Two Restaurants & Two Pools
hotels.description: Find a slice of Mallorcan bliss, somewhere between the sky and the sea, with a breathtaking five-star Jumeirah Mallorca retreat. The palatial property peers over the cliff face of the Serra de Tramuntana, providing unbeatable panoramic vistas of the ocean, mountains and port. Be immersed in luxury within softly muted interiors, sip cocktails against picture-perfect backdrops and feel all worries slip away as the apricot sun dips below the horizon. Get a glimpse into the Mallorcan way with laid-back drinks at one of three buzzing bars, a mouthwatering Spanish feast at the delightful Cap Roig Brasserie, a paddle in the picturesque pools, and to top it all off, a reviving treatment at the renowned Talise Spa. Come up for air and stay in the clouds forever.

hotels.title: Mallorca Rural Hideaway in Tramuntan Mountains with Natural Spring Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Set in the foothills of Mallorca’s Serra de Tramuntana mountains, this lovingly restored 18th-century estate embraces slow, sustainable tourism. Highlights include a natural, spring-fed pool, 70 hectares of private land, and Mirabona Restaurant, where garden-to-table Mediterranean specialities take centre stage in a serene setting. For total relaxation, indulge your senses at The Garden Spa, complete with a wooden outdoor pool and sauna, or enjoy outdoor yoga paired with mountain views. A little further afield, take some time to explore the surrounding nature on foot or by bike (charges apply), discover nearby towns and villages or head to the island's pristine coves and beaches.

hotels.title: Mallorca Wellness Escape with High-End Day Spa
hotels.description: Island luxury and fresh sea breezes are what you'll find at Kimpton Aysla Mallorca, an IHG Hotel, a Spanish sanctuary enveloped by lush native gardens just 14 kilometres from Palma. Experience the good life with a refreshing dip in the resort's huge outdoor swimming pool, sip cocktails at the open-air pool bar or indulge in sumptuous pan-Asian cuisine at Saba Restaurant. For ultimate relaxation, Spa by Maison CODAGE offers luxury treatments including massages, LED therapy and mud baths.

hotels.title: Five-Star Adults Only Hideaway in Exclusive Mediterranean Marina
hotels.description: Be overcome by romance at Pure Salt Port Adriano, hidden in an idyllic Mediterranean marina with pristine coastal views and dripping with decadent, Spanish features. Step out of the cascading pool onto the Mallorca beach, or pass the time at the O Spa with a wellness treatment. Practise your skills with the hotel's golf simulator, and satiate your appetite at restaurant Adriana, where a passionate team serve specialty dishes against an exclusive backdrop.

hotels.title: Mallorca Self-Contained Luxury Suites in the Heart of Palma
hotels.description: Live the Mediterranean dream in a self-contained, spacious and stylish space at Samaritana Suites, Mallorca. Situated in the vibrant heart of Palma, just a few minutes from sparkling beaches and waterfront dining, this intimate collection of suites boasts classic elegance and modern comforts. The city's vibrant cultural scene, world-class museums, gourmet dining venues and high-end shopping districts are just a stone's throw away.
